extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 2 and (CISC101 or CISC110 or CISC121 or permission of the Department).

basic.description: This course surveys current best practices for implementing attractive, usable, secure and maintainable web and mobile applications. Other issues considered include: accessibility, platform and browser independence, licensing of intellectual property, scalability, user privacy, and using web technologies in mobile development.
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Web and Mobile Applications
